name: CMGT_Portal_CaseIdentifierValidation
description: Rule to validate case identifiers that a user types into the portal to check their case
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!parts: split(ri!string, "-"),
  not(
    or(
      count(local!parts) <> 2,
      len(ri!string) < 9,
      len(ri!string) > 18,
      len(local!parts[1]) > 10,
      len(local!parts[1]) < 1,
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
        stripwith(
          ri!string,
          "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-"
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
